weakness: AUTH-001 - Failed login burst (possible password guessing)
risk_statement: Repeated authentication failures may indicate credential guessing, increasing the likelihood of unauthorized access if controls (e.g., lockout/MFA) are ineffective.
recommended_actions: Validate whether the source IP is expected (VPN, admin subnet, known jump box). | Check for additional failed logins for the same user across other hosts. | If suspicious: reset credentials, review MFA status, and block IP if appropriate. | Confirm AC-7 lockout policy and alert thresholds are enforced.
